comment.author: Robert
comment.text: Eric instead of sharing stuff about the black people getting shot. How about you post some stuff about what happened in Dallas.

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: I can think both are atrocities, and I hope you do too.

replies.author: Robert
replies.text: I've yet to see any of it. The only thing I've seen is about cops are the bad ones. And that post about you got away with just a warning cause your white. White people die at the heads of cops too. It's not just black people. And that's how your acting. It's all what the media wants to show you. #backtheblue #trump16

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: Look again, Robert. Read everything I've posted in the last 24 hours.
